content: Do all buses in London run on time?

As an AI language model, I don't have real-time access to transportation data or the ability to provide current information about specific bus schedules in London. However, in general, public transportation systems, including buses, can experience delays due to various factors such as traffic congestion, roadworks, weather conditions, or other unforeseen events.

It's always a good idea to check the latest updates from transportation authorities or use real-time tracking apps to plan your journey accordingly. If you have any other questions, feel free to ask!
